attributes.action: All teachers get Covid-19 vaccine before schools open.
attributes.additional_details: To help ensure the safety of my children myself and the lives of millions more I would like to see a rapid roll out of Covid Vaccines to all teachers and support staff. Teachers are frontline staff and face children who may not understand what social distance is.
attributes.background: I myself am in the extremely vulnerable category with regards to Covid-19. I had my first vaccine last week.  I have 3 children in school and worry so much for the safety of the children and teachers, teaching assistants and then some. If you truly want to fight this evil virus more must be done.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572419.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
